evidence.text: Defendant City of Houston is a municipal corporation organized under the laws of the State of Texas.  It is the most populous city in Texas and is located in Harris County, the most populous county in the state.  The City of Houston operates the Houston Police Department (“HPD”) and the City of Houston Jail (“Houston Jail”).
